Hey there! :)
Thanks for stopping by.

I believe, you shouldn't blindly trust anything that you see online. So, if we ever meet in person, you'll meet a person who is very curious about lot many things in life. Most probably, you would have reached this page, because you might have heard my name is some field related to software development. Well, that is my passion ofcourse, but there are many other things that like doing.

I would not list my interests here, mainly because they keep changing every now and then.

There are mainly two thoughts which drives my life. Those are Regret Minimization Framework and Trusting the Process. If you apply these two in your life, you'll be doing things which no one would've expect you to do. And these simple concepts will help you become the best version of yourself.
